name: Queen Majesty Scotch Bonnet & Ginger Hot Sauce 5oz.
description:
The Scotch Bonnet hot pepper is found mainly in the Caribbean, Guyana, the Maldives islands and West Africa. It resembles the habanero pepper in heat but has a sweeter flavor and stouter shape.

Queen Majesty Scotch Bonnet & Ginger Hot Sauce. Enough kick for hot sauce lovers but not too hot that you can't taste the rest of your food. Super flavorful in a fresh and unique way.

INGREDIENTS:
Vinegar, onions, bell peppers, scotch bonnet peppers, lime juice, ginger root, garlic, salt, olive oil, and spices. 

Shipping & Handling:

Flat Rate of $5.00 plus $1.00 for each additional bottle.
For example, 1 = $13.00 Total, 2 bottles = $22.00 Total, etc.

USPS Priority Mail.

Thank you!

name: Queen Majesty Jalape単o Tequila & Lime Hot Sauce 5oz.
description:
The Jalape単o hot pepper originates in Mexico and is most commonly used before it's ripe. It's juice is said to have cardiovascular benefits and help alleviate seasonal allergies.

Queen Majesty Jalape単o Tequila & Lime Hot Sauce. This has a lot of green kick from the peppers that highlight a tequila spice and refreshing lime tartness. Great on eggs, tacos, sandwiches and pretty much everything else. And don't worry, the alcohol from the tequila is burned off in the cooking process.


INGREDIENTS:
Vinegar, lime juice, jalape単o peppers, onions, white tequila, garlic, green apple, ginger root, olive oil, salt & spices.

Shipping & Handling:

Flat Rate of $5.00 plus $1.00 for each additional bottle.
For example, 1 = $13.00 Total, 2 bottles = $22.00 Total, etc.

USPS Priority Mail.

Thank you!

name: Queen Majesty 2 oz. Sampler Gift Box
description:
A great little gift for a hot sauce lover! This 4" clear, flexible cube contains both flavors of QMHS and is tied up with black grosgrain ribbon. If you are sending directly to someone special, the packing slip will be left out and a gift card with a note is included at no extra charge, just let us know what it should say : )

Shipping & Handling:

Flat Rate of $7.00 plus $3.00 for each additional box. 
For example, 1 = $17.00 Total, 2 boxes = $30.00 Total, etc.

USPS Priority Mail.

Thank you!

name: Queen Majesty Hot Sauce Tote Bag
description:
Show your love of hot sauce and leopards with this 15" x 15.5" 100% Cotton tote bag silk screened in Brooklyn with Queen Majesty Scotch Bonnet and Ginger Hot Sauce original artwork. Colors are a bit brighter / more neon than in the picture.

Shipping & Handling included.
